description: Gas- and aerosol-phase MONARCH species that are not part of the base CB05 mechanism but are included in the 'mod37' configuration

pmc-data.name: ISOPP1G
pmc-data.description: 1st product of isoprene oxidation in 2-product SOA scheme.

pmc-data.name: ISOPP2G
pmc-data.description: 2nd product of isoprene oxidation in 2-product SOA scheme.

pmc-data.name: APINP1G
pmc-data.description: 1st product of alpha-pinene oxidation in 2-product SOA scheme.

pmc-data.name: APINP2G
pmc-data.description: 2nd product of alpha-pinene oxidation in 2-product SOA scheme.
